monogr.title: A sermon preached at Wimondham : in Norfolke, at the primary visitation of the Right Honourable and Reverend Father in God, Matthevv, Lord Bishop of Norwich, on the third of Iune, Ann. Dom. 1636. By Richard Tedder
monogr.author: Tedder, Richard

div.head: TO THE RIGHT REVEREND FATHER IN GOD, MATTHEW,. Lord Bishop of Norwich, and Deane of the Kings Majesties Chappell Royall.
div.p:
I Present this Sermon unto you with all humblenesse, which was preached at your Lordshps Visitation. The Time, the Place, the Occasion, yea My selfe beare such a relation to you, that they move me to sue to your Lordship for the patronage
of it. God grant your Lordship encrease of dayes, and honour, that both God and the Church may receive an encrease of honour by them both. This is the daily prayer of him who is, and will be

closer.signed: Your Lordships in all humble duty, RICHARD TEDDER.
